Articles.Content:
Sometimes I'm crazy but most of the time that I am is when I'm right.

Hi. I am here for a taste of blood in the vacuum of space in search for unicorns. No, honestly, I'm just here for blood. Specifically Jeb's.

My main reason for joining (other than more of Jeb's blood) is my interest in the challenges. Hoping to see a good one and participate soon.

I'll try to evade this kind of behavior as much as possible as it does not seem proper. But when I dont, it means the other side has taken over.

I'll see you kerbs around. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Want a good challenge? \*Shameless plug ahead\* [Check out For The Stealthiest...](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121473-For-The-Stealthiest) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

But welcome aboard!

> 
> Want a good challenge? \*Shameless plug ahead\* [Check out For The Stealthiest...](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121473-For-The-Stealthiest) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> But welcome aboard!

A fair challenge indeed. I'm not quite sure about how an F-117 but I will try to participate in it soon in my free time. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> [...]
> Hi. I am here for a taste of blood in the vacuum of space in search for unicorns. No, honestly, I'm just here for blood. Specifically Jeb's.
> 
> My main reason for joining (other than more of Jeb's blood) is my interest in the challenges.
> 
> [...]

Blood fetishist, huh? Just what the kermiverse needs: more vampires. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Blood fetishist, huh? Just what the kermiverse needs: more vampires. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

 We are currently in low numbers against the immortal Jeb. It's tough, but we will soon have him.
